Class DBLoader

java.lang.Object
utils.DBLoader
public class DBLoader extends Object
Template class databases.DBLoader can be used to serialize CSV files and deserialize CSV files in memory.

  • Method Details

    • loadCSV

      public static <T> HashMap<String,T> loadCSV(String filename, Class<T> cls) throws IOException
      Template
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type (models.Appointment, Patient etc.) of object that we are trying to read in
      Parameters:
      filename - name of csvfile to be passed in for processing
      cls - the class of the database being built
      Returns:
      HashMap of key type String and value store of T, where the string is the ID.
      Throws:
      IOException
